definitions.definition: The situation or occurrence in which two or more objects or events act upon one another to produce a new effect ; the effect resulting from such a situation or occurrence.
examples: Be aware of interactions between different medications.

definitions.definition: A conversation or exchange between people.
examples: I enjoyed the interaction with a bunch of like-minded people.

main_definition: The situation or occurrence in which two or more objects or events act upon one another to produce a new effect ; the effect resulting from such a situation or occurrence.
secondary_definitions: A conversation or exchange between people.
